resources.string: Please enter a mission name and try again.\n\n(If you think this is an error, report it to github.com\/shaunakg)
This app requires storage permission to store and read the mission database. You must click OK to use this app, otherwise contact devs at https://git.io/fxsln.
Developer routine error. What did you think was going to happen? Contact developers (https://git.io/fxsln).

string.name: txtCredits_message
string.a: Made with lots of time by Shaunak G.

resources.string:
Enter a mission name (example: "apollo") or one of the following commands and press "GET INFORMATION":
 
 > "list" (Get the URL where there is a link to all missions - hosted by NASA)
 > "database" (Get the URL to the actual csv database used in the app, may hold more detail)
 > "license" (See a copy of the GNU General Public License v3, which this app is licensed under) 

 Your mission URL will appear here, to get rid of it press the "GET INFORMATION/CLEAR" button again.

 Copyright © 2018 @shaunakg (GitHub)

 This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,

 You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License
 along with this program. If not, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/.##

This is a multi-line test string.
 It should be shown in a dialog box.
 
 This line should wrap, if it has any common decency and regard for its developer.
 
 Report bugs to\:
 https\://github.com/shaunakg/ (recommended)
 or leave a review in the Play Store.
 
 Thanks for using this app.
 
 Note\: In case you are seeing this string as a actual user of this app, please report it as a bug. For now, you can close this dialog box.
